review: The doctor made our teenage daughter feel comfortable right off the bat. He explained the procedural treatment options concisely and with clarity.  Looking forward to continuing doctor support as we proceed with the recommended treatment plan.

review: Doctor comes across as very friendly and client centric in his approach. He makes his patients feel very comfortable which helps the patient to relax and not be stressful.

review: Love The Art of Braces! Dr. Soumo Mitra and her staff have made me feel super comfortable not only with their professionalism but also their protocols during COVID-19. Dr. Soumo Mitra is awesome  at answering all my questions and communicates in a way that is easy to understand.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr Soumo Mitra is an expert in the true sense, he has a very amicable approach which helps you feel comfortable and you would be able to discuss your issues more easily and in a better way. I was really satisfied by the way he provided various angles to his solutions and I really feel he is definitely worth a visit for your dental issues
